Davenport.Bonaventura Heinz House (second): The Bonaventura Heinz House is a historic building located in the West End of Davenport, Iowa, United States. It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since 1983. Another house was also attributed to him, Bonaventura Heinz House (first), which was also listed on the NRHP in 1983.
